sentences.en: Add the oats to thicken the mixture and stir until it is nice and creamy.
sentences.cn: 加上燕麦让混合料变稠，然后搅拌成奶油状。

sentences.en: As we age the lenses of the eyes thicken, and thus refract light dif-ferently.
sentences.cn: 随着我们年龄的增长，眼睛的晶状体变厚，因此对光线的折射也会发生变化。

sentences.en: Beat the eggs and sugar until they start to thicken.
sentences.cn: 把鸡蛋和白糖混在一起搅打至开始变稠。

sentences.en: But as the investigation continued, the plot began to thicken.
sentences.cn: 但是随着调查的继续深入，情况开始变得复杂起来。

sentences.en: He added some flour to thicken the soup.
sentences.cn: 他加了一些面粉使汤变稠.

sentences.en: I always thicken my soups by adding flour.
sentences.cn: 我总是加面粉将汤调浓.

sentences.en: If you want to thicken the soup, add some flour.
sentences.cn: 如果你想使汤浓些, 加一点面粉.

sentences.en: The crowds around him began to thicken.
sentences.cn: 他四周的人群密集起来。

sentences.en: The fog was beginning to thicken.
The pudding will thicken as it cools.
sentences.cn: 这道布丁菜凉了就会变稠.

sentences.en: Thicken the broth with the cornflour.
Thicken the soup by adding potatoes.
Thicken with cornstarch water and stir. Heat off and serve.
sentences.cn: 下生粉水埋芡炒匀, 即可熄火上碟.

sentences.en: Use flour to thicken the gravy.
Use the paper to thicken your notebook.
sentences.cn: 用这些纸加厚你的笔记本.

sentences.en: We'll add some flour to thicken the soup.
sentences.cn: 我们将加点粉把汤调浓些.

sentences.en: You can thicken the soup with flour.
sentences.cn: 你可以用面粉使汤变浓.

words.tran_cn: 最拥挤部份；活动最多部份；事物的粗大浓密部份
增厚；增稠剂，[食品] 芡粉；稠化
[林] 灌木丛；丛林；错综复杂
使变厚；变浓（thicken的现在分词）
变浓；变厚；变得模糊；变粗；变复杂
使变厚；使模糊；使…变复杂

phrases.tran_cn: 情节变得（更）复杂了，情况变得（更）捉摸不定了

trans.tran_en: to become thick, or make something thick

trans.tran_cn: 变得不清晰，变得模糊，变复杂
使（话等）不清晰，使模糊，使（情节等）复杂
